description: Dates and ripe bananas naturally sweeten this wholesome oat flour based banana bread.
keywords: Banana bread,Pescatarian,Banana,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Egg,Dairy free
name: Oat, Date & Walnut Banana Loaf Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the dates in a small bowl of boiling water for 20 minutes to soften. Drain and set aside. Preheat the oven to 175°C/155°C fan-forced and line a loaf tin with parchment paper.
Blend the oats to a coarse flour in a food processor. Add the soaked dates cinnamon, baking powder, baking soda, bananas, eggs and vanilla and pulse to form a smooth batter.
Stir in the chopped walnuts. Pour the batter into the loaf tin and bake for 30 minutes, or until a skewer comes out clean.
Remove from the oven and leave to cool completely on a wire rack before serving.
